long_description:
**Tool Crafter** is a MOD add a "Tool Crafting Table" to craft all handle tool with any allowed material without register any recipe.  
  
You can add **ANY MATERIAL** in Setting, but typically it use group to search and add material.  
Recipe book **ONLY have some "Blueprint Recipe"** to show how to place item in crafttable to make a tool.  
i.e. You can have a lot of tool without a lot of recipe only replaced material.  
- They don't show in Survival Mode but You can Use Creative Mode to see Every Tool, Which can be Messy depend on how many material allowed.

## Version Info ##

Ver. 1.0 beta (current version) basic function + support MTG tool and material, also playable in Asuna  
  
This MOD make in **Minetest 5.10.0-dev**, maybe can work in previous version but I can't ensure that.

## Feature List ##

  - Add "Tool Crafting Table" named **"Tool Crafter"** into minetest world
  - **High Customizable Setting** for Material Selection, **DO NOT add so much** material
  - **"Blueprint Recipe"** to replace all handle tool recipe, give you a clean recipe book without a bunch of tool only replace with different material
  - allow player to **craft "Rod"** of every material to boost tool status

## Who should use this MOD? ##

FOR someone who like have a lot of material but don't want their tool show in recipe book, like me :P  
OR someone who want tool have more variant and color

## Where Alloy MOD? ##

This used to be part of alloy mod, because I need a crafter to make use of alloy  
but after create ore mod, I decide to make a sperate MOD for crafter without any touch of alloy

## Warning ##

It should stable on singleplayer but I never test on any server

## Build-in Support of my other MOD ##

  - alloyore [Alloy Ore]
  > support 'ingot' and 'ingot-like' group assign in this MOD, any item with those group should auto select for material  
  > that mean you don't need to play around setting or wait support to make this work

## Other (3rd-party) MOD Support ##

  - minetest_game [Minetest Game] (https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?t=9724)
  - ethereal [Ethereal] (https://forum.minetest.net/viewtopic.php?t=14638)

**Maybe Future Support** after complete Alloy MOD  

  - mcl
  - 3d armor
